title: $:/plugins/wikilabs/field-visibility
name: Toggle Field Visibility
description: Change the field visibility in the tiddler info area fields tab
author: Mario Pietsch

"},"$:/core/ui/TiddlerFieldTemplate":{"title":"$:/core/ui/TiddlerFieldTemplate","created":"20211108163205528","modified":"20211108173611854","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define getFieldName() $:/config/EditTemplateFields/Visibility/$(listItem)$ \define toggle-field-visibility() \whitespace trim <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" disabled={{{ [is[shadow]then[yes]] }}}> <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="hide" default="show" tag="span"> {{$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-visibility/images/eye-strikethrough}} <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="show" default="show" tag="span"> {{$:/core/images/preview-open}} <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $value="hide"/> \end <$text text=<>/> <$view field=<>/> <> "},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-visibility/history":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-visibility/history","text":" V 0.0.1 * Initial release tested down to TODO "},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-visibility/images/eye-strikethrough":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-visibility/images/eye-strikethrough","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":""},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-visibility/license":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-visibility/license","text":"[[Field Visibility Toggle|https://wikilabs.github.io/#field-visibility]] (c) Mario Pietsch - 2021- https://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause "},"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-visibility/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/wikilabs/field-visibility/readme","text":"\define showInfo() <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/popup/tiddler-info-471453735" text="yes" /> \end This plugin adds a toggle button to the Fields tab in the tiddler info area, which can be seen in tiddler view mode. If you need the tiddler info button in edit mode you will need to install the: "Tiddler Info in Edit Mode" plugin. <$button actions=<> to="test-field-visibility" > Click this button to show the tiddler info area ''Important:'' This plugin changes the following core tiddlers * $:/core/ui/TiddlerInfo/Fields * $:/core/ui/TiddlerFieldTemplate "}}}
